title: TAMIL EELAM SUPPORTERS ORGANIZATION OF KARUNANIDHI MINUS A  DEMAND FOR EELAM
content: Onlanka News – by Walter Jayawardhana The Tamil Eelam Supporters Organisation (TESO), a forum started by DMK leader M. Karunanidhi,  has dropped the demand to create a Tamil Eelam as expected earlier  in its theme paper issued on Monday July 16…
